|brand = Cisco |model = WAP200 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = G54 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = access point |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = Q87-WAP200 |icid = 3839A-WAP200 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Star;STR9110;CNS1110-200BG304-AD00-G; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM FA526 |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- ARM Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 200 <!-- 200 / 250MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = 32-bit
|flash1type = Parallel |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;29LV320DTTI-70G;32Mbit Flash; |flash1size = 4 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 16 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5DS8M16FS-5T;128Mbit DDR SDRAM;; |ram1_num = 1 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = IC+;IP101;IP101 LF; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 6C:50:4D, A4:93:4C |oui = 6C:50:4D, A4:93:4C
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = Mini PCI |exp_minipci_num = 1
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_poe_type = af |pwr_poe = <!-- POE Volts --> |pwr_poe_amp = <!-- POE Amps --> |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = 802.3af PD Controller with Integrated DC/DC;TI;TPS23750;;1; ,,, 10/100 Base-TX VoIP Magnetics Module;Bothhand;TS8019M;1; |802dot11_protocols = bg
|defaulip = 192.168.1.245 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = ciscosb |defaultssid_regex = ^ciscosb$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Gemtek |manuf_model = WAPS-169GN |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 10/19/2006 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 745883574452 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B005AOHB3A |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = B005ATI9E0 |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Gemtek WMIR-180GH |rad1modif = Mini PCI |rad1chip1 = Ralink;RT2661; |rad1chip2 = Ralink;RT2529; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== '''Cisco Small Business'''
"WAPS-169GN_V02" and "ENG-D06-6602R" is silkscreened on the board.
The default SSID of this device is '''ciscosb'''. :The FCC manual states the default SSID is '''linksys-g'''.. and it may, perhaps, be.. for '''[[Linksys]]''' branded units (if any exist).
The power supply included with the device (in US regions) appears to be a '''Leader Electronics''' MT12-4120100-A1 (120VAC ~ 60 Hz, 0.3A -> 12VDC, 1.0A).
==Links of Interest== *[http://www.cisco.com/en/US/docs/wireless/access_point/csbap/wap200/administration/guide/WAP200_V10_UG_Rev_B_web.pdf User Guide] *[http://www.speedguide.net/routers/linksys-wap200-wireless-g-access-point-with-power-237 On '''SpeedGuide.net'''] *[https://www.insidegadgets.com/2013/07/21/inside-the-cisco-wap200-wireless-g-ap-with-poe-and-rangebooster/ On '''insidegadgets.com''']
